name: Time Drive
description:
This game made for Godot Wild Jam #35 : LOST TECH

Mankind discovered  Time Drive. It is the Time Maker's lost tech with the ability to manipulate time. They track the Time Maker back to his dimension but accidentally brake the time's shell. Soon or later time will be collapsed. Except you can bring the Time Stabilizer to the dimension core with the help of the Time Drive equipped UAV.
